QuestData.Title: Presence of Power
QuestData.Description: The demons appear to be harnessing an ancient power within the Temple itself. They've managed to twist and corrupt these sacred grounds with fel magic.$B$BWe must remove the demonic presence before we press our final advance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Repel the Legion threat from the Temple of a Thousand Lights, then Slay Portal-Keeper V'thaal and Zor'thaduun.

Objectives.Objective: Meet Prince Farondis outside the Temple
